page.title: 09JUNIOR GIRLS'GAMES IN N.YATE
page.content: {Bogie}:one person stands in the middle of the playground and counts to a hundred while everybody else runs away to hide.When she opens her eyes again she tries to find the other people.If the people get into the middle of the playground without being touched they shout bogie!If everybody gets in the middle and shouts bogie the person in the middle is on it again. {Non-stop-cricket}:You have two teams, one team fields and one team bats.It is fairer if the teacher bowls.The fielding team has to try and catch the other team out,or they are out if the bat or the ball touches the wicket. {Rounders}:Again you have two teams, batters and fielders.There are four posts forming a circle and one person bowls and the batters have to try and hit it with a wooden bat.If the ball is caught whoever hit it is out.
